Encountered web application with user login feature
Entered malicious payload containing SQL injection attack into login parameter
Payload caused application to execute valid SQL query, bypassing authentication mechanism
Application logged me in as administrator, confirming presence of SQL injection vulnerability
Researched application's database schema and structure
Crafted payload containing script to extract sensitive information from DB
Payload allowed to extract sensitive information from DB such as flag for Web Exploitation challenge
Exploited the vulnerability to extract sensitive information from database and complete the Web Exploitation challenge
Demonstrated the potential risks associated with SQL injection
